text:
Lynn Wittstock is an American water polo player and coach. She was a member of the United States women's national water polo team at the 1980 World Aquatic Championships, 1984 World Aquatic Championships, and 1988 World Aquatic Championships. She was inducted in the USA Water Polo Hall of Fame.
She played for Slippery Rock University's women's water polo team. She coached at Saint Mary's College and Bucknell University.
